name: Bitter
description:
Bitter is a game about the bitter truths of life. How a hobo doesn't get any respect in society. How your reputation is the most important...

In bitter, your main goal is to (re)BUILD your reputation. A certain order must be followed if you plan to win this game. This game involves a lot of strategy and mind power, just like chess. You should be aware of your surroundings, how things can get out of hand if you don't act responsibly.

But the most important of all, this is the early 1900s.


CubeCry (me) - Pixel Artist

AstroCookie Games - Programmer

          

Computer:-

A & D to move

Click on objects ( bird, passerby civilian, and a crying kid ) to interact with them

Mobile:-

Buttons to move

Tap on objects ( bird, passerby civilian, and a crying kid ) to interact with them

GAMEPLAY:

Do Your Daily tasks - feed the birds and buy the kid a toy

        

Music:-

Gdevelop assets store:)

      

This game is a submission to the GDevelop Game Jam #1. It's just a prototype. The post-jam version of this game will be available to play soon and I promise that the Jam version will also be available. For now, it's just ENDLESS, we couldn't get enough time to complete it so we submitted whatever we could.
